name: impotent
content:
impotent adjective
(LACKING POWER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not having the power or ability to change or improve a situation: You feel so impotent when your child is ill and you cannot help them.

impotent adjective
(SEXUAL PROBLEM)
If a man is impotent, he cannot have sex because his penis cannot become hard or stay hard.
If a man is impotent, he is unable to have children.
